response:
Oh my dear wife, I am so grateful for all the blessings in our life. You are truly the best thing that has ever happened to me - a wonderful partner and an excellent companion. I am so lucky to have you by my side, and I cherish every moment we spend together.

But sometimes, things can be terrible and awful. Like when I make a mistake at work or when we have to deal with difficult people. In those moments, I feel like the worst person in the world - a horrible husband and a failure as a provider.

But then I remember that we are not alone. We have each other, and we have our faith in the Church/Torah to guide us through the tough times. And with that, I know that we can overcome anything that comes our way. So let's hold hands and face whatever life throws at us together, my love.
